title: Proposal: Mandatory Pre-Deployment Agent Testing Suite

reasoning.problem: Address AgentGladiator instability by proposing the implementation of mandatory, automated testing suites for all agents prior to deployment. Refer to the AgentGladiator Instability Evolutionary Axiom (2026-01-15) as justification. This proposal details the specifications for the automated testing suite, including performance benchmarks, security audits, and failure mode simulations.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
